code: import{AUTH}from"../../constants";import axios from"@helpers/axios/public.axios";export const loginVerify=_ref=>{let{email,password,hash,verification}=_ref;return async dispatch=>{try{const response=await axios.post("/login/verify",{email,password,hash,code:verification});const{user,token}=response.data.data;console.log(response,hash);dispatch({type:AUTH.AUTH_RESPONSE,payload:{user,token,isDemoUser:false}});return{user,token};}catch(e){dispatch({type:AUTH.AUTH_ERROR,payload:e.response.data.message});throw e;}};};
